## R Programming

- [Open Case Studies](https://www.opencasestudies.org/) walks learners through authentic datasets to learn R programming.

## Community

- The [Genomic Data Science Community Network (GDSCN)](https://www.gdscn.org/) brings together instructors and researchers at under-resourced institutions for developing new curriculum and likeminded projects.
 
- [BioDIGS](https://biodigs.org/) is a research consortium focused on soil metagenomics, founded by the GDSCN.
